Perfect! I've successfully added the Last.fm API environment variables to both GitHub Actions workflow files:

1. **`.github/workflows/firebase-hosting-merge.yml`** - Added `VITE_LASTFM_API_KEY` and `VITE_LASTFM_API_SECRET` to the environment variable injection section
2. **`.github/workflows/firebase-hosting-pull-request.yml`** - Added the same Last.fm variables to the environment variable injection section

Both workflow files now include the Last.fm API credentials alongside the existing Firebase and Spotify environment variables. The variables will be injected from GitHub Secrets during the build process, ensuring they're available for the application at runtime.

Remember to add these secrets to your GitHub repository settings:
- `VITE_LASTFM_API_KEY`
- `VITE_LASTFM_API_SECRET`
